name: Beach of 99 skeletons
description:
Controls: Arrow keys to move, z/x/space to fire and r to restart

This game was supposed to be made in three days and I had many plans for this game but had to make it in one day because I did not have any time for Mini Jam 108.

Synopsis:

you are stuck in an island of 99 undead skeleton because of your inner Indiana Jones now fight for your life

Note: the music is not mine, it is made by David Renda, got it here

(i know this game is trash)
